page.title: 17VISIT TO N.CAVE METAL WORKS
page.content: The three of us went along to the base metal works in Crosslands Lane(ref.882323). A lady came to talk to us in the office. She said that lorries come from all over the country to deliver ore and the M62 is very useful to them. They trade with people from all over the world buying and selling non-ferrous metals. Telephones are used a lot. The firm employs 25 people from Managers to process workers and it is constantly expanding. The firm only moved headquarters to North Cave in 1985 but is l0 years old. The factory was suitable, workers lived nearby and transport is easy. The new premises have proved ideal for Base Metal Synergy and the Managing Director lives in North Cave.
